subdisciplines.name: Critical Race Theory
subdisciplines.description: The examination of how race and racism intersect with other forms of social inequality, such as class, gender, and sexuality.

subdisciplines.name: Queer and Gender Studies
subdisciplines.description: The exploration of how gender and sexual identity are constructed, represented, and regulated in cultural contexts.

subdisciplines.name: Postcolonial Theory
subdisciplines.description: The analysis of the ongoing effects of colonialism and imperialism on global power relations, cultures, and identities.
